snippet.title: Before The Dawn —  A top-down shooting Rougelite game！
snippet.description:
In a city where a zombie virus suddenly broke out, upgrade weapons, drive vehicles, search for supplies, and activate Signal towers for rescue! Use strategy to combine your equipment and fight your way out of the zombie tide!

Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2225870/Before_The_Dawn/
